Uses of Interface
com.bonitasoft.engine.platform.Tenant

  • Packages that use Tenant 
    Package Description
    com.bonitasoft.engine.api
    The Bonita BPM project has a clear separation between the API the users should be interacting with and the actual implementation classes.

    • Uses of Tenant in com.bonitasoft.engine.api

      Methods in com.bonitasoft.engine.api that return Tenant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tenant PlatformAPI.getDefaultTenant()
      Get default tenant.
      Tenant PlatformAPI.getTenantById(long tenantId)
      get a tenant using its tenantId
      Tenant PlatformAPI.getTenantByName(String tenantName)
      Get a tenant using its name.
      Tenant PlatformAPI.updateTenant(long tenantId, TenantUpdater udpater)
      Update a tenant with its tenantId and new content.
      Methods in com.bonitasoft.engine.api that return types with arguments of type Tenant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Tenant> PlatformAPI.getTenants(int startIndex, int maxResults, TenantCriterion pagingCriterion)
      Get a list of tenants.
      SearchResult<Tenant> PlatformAPI.searchTenants(SearchOptions searchOptions)
      Search tenant under the given condition, including pagination, term, filter, sort.
